mods.abstract: RUNAWAY FROM the undersigned, near Opelousas, about the 1st of February inst., a negro-boy named JOHN or Jean Congo, aged about 26 years, very black, middle size, braided hair, smiling face. A liberal reward will be given to woever will bring back said boy to the undersigned or lodge him in Jail. A. LASTRAPES. St. Landry, Feb., 12th, 1859

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
